column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////When we got our food
column2: our waiter never came to check on us. We paid extra for sodas and despite being finished early into the appetizer
column3: they were not once refilled. Another pet peeve of my soda guzzling S.O. Ok so we had waters from before we ordered the sodas
column4: we drank those. I attempted to get the attention of our waiter but as you'll quickly see
column5: it was more difficult than it was worth in this instance.
